configDescription.doc: A documentation string for display to the user for this config

googleTagManagerId.doc: Google Tage Manager ID(s). Set as a JSON array in the GTM_ID env variable

DEBUG.doc: Turns on verbose logging and other integrity checks for new plugins

serverName.doc: Name of the server displayed to the user
serverName.default: Server Name Not Set In Config

serverNameShort.doc: Name of the server displayed in Forms and Icons

home.doc: Home Folder for help text. This section has the same format as a register config, but renders the home page instead

version.doc: Version of the server, for display to the user

port.doc: The port that the server listens to

registersFolderPath.doc: A string wtih a folder path of subfolders containing plugins

urlPrefix.doc: A prefix to mount the server somewhere other than the root

uploadFolderPath.doc: The temp folder for holding upload files

logging.doc: Object to control the Pino Logger
